participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and introverted, enjoys crafting and prefers quiet environments.
participant_1.background: I am passionate about being crafty and working with my hands. I like to shop. I like to stay away from big crowds, so Comic Con isn't my thing. I am the leader of the french fry research department at Del Taco. I do not drink alcohol.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and energetic, loves sharing opinions and engaging in sports.
participant_2.background: I look forward to sharing my opinions with others and starting a new life in Australia. I love basketball. I ride my bicycle everywhere. I work at the pizza parlor. I get to show off my long fingernails.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! I'm about to start a new life in Australia, so I'm pretty excited. How about you?
That's awesome! I'm glad to hear you're excited. I'm doing well, thanks. I'm the leader of the french fry research department at Del Taco.
Wow, that's a really interesting job! I'm sure it's a lot of fun. I work at a pizza parlor, so I'm always around food.
I love pizza! What's your favorite kind?
I love pepperoni pizza the most, but I also like Hawaiian pizza. What about you?
I love cheese pizza the most, but I also like pepperoni and mushroom pizza.
Those are all great choices! I'm glad we both love pizza.
Me too! It's the best food ever.
I agree. It's so delicious and filling.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to play basketball and ride my bicycle. I also like to go shopping and watch movies.
Those are all great hobbies! I like to shop and watch movies too. I also like to be crafty and work with my hands.
That's awesome! I've never been very crafty, but I'd love to learn.
It's really fun! You should give it a try.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help.
